an3.125:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati gotamake cetiye.
an3.125:2.2: Sanidānāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desemi, no anidānaṃ.
an3.125:2.3: Sappāṭihāriyāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desemi, no appāṭihāriyaṃ.
an3.125:2.4: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññāya dhammaṃ desayato no anabhiññāya, sanidānaṃ dhammaṃ desayato no anidānaṃ, sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desayato no appāṭihāriyaṃ, karaṇīyo ovādo, karaṇīyā anusāsanī.
an3.125:2.5: Alañca pana vo, bhikkhave, tuṭṭhiyā, alaṃ attamanatāya, alaṃ somanassāya:
an3.125:3.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
an3.125:3.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne sahassī lokadhātu akampitthāti.
